We offer you a genuine MasterCard with no limit*,
so you can spend anywhere MasterCard is accepted.
Your assets will remain in your account at the same time.
*Note: Your credit card limit is based on the proportion of assets in your trust account.
FGA Trust is a duly authorized trustee under the laws of Hong Kong
and follows the most legal and compliant trustees under international law.
Our platform is highly confidential and secure, and you can manage your assets at any time.
FGA Trust is connected to a number of major financial institutions,
allowing them to offer clients a wide range of investment options covering
securities, funds, insurance, bonds, digital currencies and precious metals,
so you will never miss an opportunity.
